article_title: GOLF: Holy Ghost's Cerbara, New Hope's Massimino on separate paths to gold - Bucks County Courier Times: High school ice golf

og.description: The state championship might be the ultimate for a high school golfer, but it might turn out the toughest competition Steve Cerbara or Roland Massimino had to face this year was in the Bicentennial Athletic League championship.
